Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class that holds information about a gven player of Starcraft 2 It will hold the following information about a player.
    • Nickname
    • Team
    • In game Race
    • Nationality
    • TLPD ID Number
    This information will mostly be drawn from Liquipedia using the LPParser class.

    This class is immutable.

    Made for MHacks - Fall 2013.

    Version:
    %I%, %G%
    Author:
    packrat386

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      Default constructor sets all values to their defaults.
      Player(java.lang.String inNick)
      takes in a nickname for a player and then uses the LPParser class to get other information about the player if possible.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getID()
      Returns the tlpd ID of the Player
      java.lang.String getNat()
      Returns the nationality code of the Player
      java.lang.String getNick()
      Returns the nickname of the Player
      java.lang.String getRace()
      Returns the race of the Player
      boolean isValid()
      Returns true if the information about the player is sufficiently complete to be used.
      java.lang.String tlpdize()
      Returns a string that generates a TLPD link when using TL.net's BBcode
      java.lang.String toString()
      Converts the information about the Player to a String

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String inNick)
       throws java.lang.Exception
        takes in a nickname for a player and then uses the LPParser class to get other information about the player if possible.
        Parameters:
        inNick - This String should uniquely identify a players name when searched on Liqipedia. If not, the information will be set to default.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
